title: Remote Bookkeeper for Small U.S. Businesses (Part-Time, Contractor)
job_overview:
WATCH ME TO LEARN MORE ABOUT THIS ROLE: Upgrade to see actual info

– About Us –
We are a fast-growing, founder-led company that helps blue-collar business owners get financial clarity and stay on top of their numbers. We provide back-office support and bookkeeping services that simplify their lives and help them make better decisions.

Our clients are mostly landscapers, contractors, and other hands-on operators — they don’t want fluff. They want reliable support from people who know what they’re doing and speak their language (they aren’t bookkeepers!).

– The Role –
We’re looking for a reliable, detail-oriented bookkeeper to join our remote team. You’ll manage the books for a small set of U.S.-based clients — making sure their transactions are categorized correctly, reconciliations are done, and monthly reports are accurate and on time.

This is a part-time contractor role, with the potential to grow as our client base expands. Most clients use QuickBooks Online (QBO), and share bank statements and notes via Google Sheets or similar tools.

– Key Responsibilities –
Set up or clean up chart of accounts in QBO (when needed)
Categorize income and expense transactions accurately
Perform monthly bank and credit card reconciliations
Flag unclear, personal, or inconsistent transactions
Deliver clear, simple monthly reports
Work with the Account Manager to keep books clean and current
Follow documentation standards and leave a paper trail of your work

– You’re a great fit if you –
Are fluent in QuickBooks Online (QBO)
Have 2+ years of bookkeeping experience with U.S.-based small businesses
Understand U.S. expense categories and general tax guidelines
Have strong attention to detail and self-management
Communicate clearly and professionally in English
Can overlap partially with U.S. business hours
Are comfortable documenting your work in Google Docs or Sheets

– Compensation –
Hourly rate between $5–$7 USD, depending on experience and skill
Paid bi-weekly via Wise or similar platform
